Sho Miyazaki
宮﨑 将
articles.contents:
Sho Miyazaki
          
          
          Home
          About
          Research
          
          
          Redistricting
           
          ▾
          
          
          ALARM Project (Harvard University)
          Japan 47-Prefecture Redistricting Simulations
          
          
          CV
          
          
          
          
          
          
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Sho Miyazaki 宮﨑 将
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        LinkedIn
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        GitHub
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            About Me
            I am a data scientist interested in legislative
            redistricting, financial markets, and rugby football. I
            major in Political Science and minor in Japanese Literature
            and Arts. I am also working as a performance data analyst of
            the varsity rugby team.
            
            
            Education
            Keio
            University | Tokyo, Japan
            L.L.B. in Political Science | April 2019 - March
            2023
            
            Harvard
            College | Cambridge, MA
            Visiting Undergraduate Student | August 2020 - May
            2021
            
            
            
            Experience
            Greenmantle |
            New York, NY (Remote)
            Research Assistant (Japan) | February 2022 -
            present
            Greenmantle is a macroeconomic and geopolitical advisory
            firm led by Niall
            Ferguson.
            
            ALARM
            Project | Cambridge, MA (Remote)
            Member | May 2021 - present
            The Algorithm-Assisted Redistricting Methodology (ALARM)
            Project is a research team at Harvard University led by Kosuke
            Imai.
            
            Verdad
            Capital | Boston, MA (Remote)
            Summer Analyst | July - August 2021
            Verdad is a quantamental (quantitative and fundamental)
            hedge fund.
            
            NTT
            Communications ShiningArcs | Chiba, Japan
            Assistant Data Analyst | February - April 2020
            ShiningArcs is a Japanese professional rugby football
            team.
            
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Sho Miyazaki 宮﨑 将
